name: 兴奋
note:
<Custom Passive Condition>
  if ($gameVariables.value(25) > 20 && $gameVariables.value(25) < 100) {
let id = 3;
if($gameVariables.value(25) > 80){
DataManager.changeDifferenceStateDescription(id,2);
}else if($gameVariables.value(25) > 40){
DataManager.changeDifferenceStateDescription(id,1);
}else{
DataManager.changeDifferenceStateDescription(id,0);
}
    condition = true;
  } else {
    condition = false;
  }
  </Custom Passive Condition>

name: 兽
note:
<HELP DESCRIPTION>
\fs[14]✦\fi\c[110]「呜噢噢噢噢……！」\fr扭曲为了满脑子只有欲望的Beast!  兴奋度:\c[18]???%\c[0]
</HELP DESCRIPTION>

  <Custom Passive Condition>
  if ($gameVariables.value(25) >= 100) {
var state = $dataStates[3];
var text = "\\fs[14]✦\\fi\\c[110]「呜噢噢噢噢……！」\\fr扭曲为了满脑子只有欲望的Beast!  兴奋度:\\c[18]???%\\c[0]";
state.description = text;
    condition = true;
  } else {
    condition = false;
  }
  </Custom Passive Condition>

name: 闪步
note:
<eva Rate: 150%>
<eva Flat: +150%>
<HELP DESCRIPTION>
\c[110]\fi「真红的三倍速」
</HELP DESCRIPTION>

  <Custom Apply Effect>
$gameSwitches.setValue(203, true);
let rateLevel = 1.5;
let flatLevel = 1.5;
if (user.hasSkill(39)) {
let extra = 1 + (0.3 * user.skillMasteryLevel(39));
rateLevel *= extra;
rateLevel = Math.floor(rateLevel * 10) / 10;
}
$dataStates[63].rateXParams[1] = rateLevel;
$dataStates[63].flatXParams[1] = flatLevel
  </Custom Apply Effect>

name: 美味い！！

\c[110]\fi「吃到了美味的东西，肚子里暖暖的〜」\fr每秒体力小回复

    let time = 3;
    let stateId = 71;
    let target = "state" + stateId;
    if ($gameSystem.hasGameTimeEvent(target)) {
        $gameSystem.adjustGameTimeEventDelay(target, time);
    } else {
        $gameSystem.addGameTimeEvent({
            key: target,
            command: 'remove',
            delayMinutes: time,
            target: stateId,
            condition: 'true'
        });
    }
  </Custom Apply Effect>

name: 皇冠剑
note:
<HELP DESCRIPTION>
\c[110]\fi「你散发着荣光」\fr全属性上升、暂时性无敌
</HELP DESCRIPTION>

<Custom Apply Effect>
$dataStates[104].flatParams[2] = 0;
$dataStates[104].flatParams[4] = 0;
$gameSwitches.setValue(100, true);
var ATKflat = user.paramBase(2) + user.paramPlus(2);
var MATflat = user.paramBase(4) + user.paramPlus(4);
ATKflat *= 2;
MATflat *= 2;
$dataStates[104].flatParams[2] += ATKflat;
$dataStates[104].flatParams[4] += MATflat;
</Custom Apply Effect>

  <Custom Remove Effect>
$gameSwitches.setValue(100, false)
  </Custom Remove Effect>

var ATKflat = Math.floor(0.1 * user.atk * skillLevel);

</Custom Apply Effect>

var skillLevel = $gameActors.actor(1).skillMasteryLevel(117);
var MHPflat = 100 * skillLevel;
var DEFflat = 2 * skillLevel;
$dataStates[110].flatParams[0] += MHPflat;
$dataStates[110].flatParams[3] += DEFflat;
</Custom Apply Effect>
